author: matkt0
content:
Hi <@792404665068158998> wanted to be sure to understand that before the meeting https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/11223/changes#diff-b4ae44357044a8606fc10a6d8433e1ee2135b1111042c88876bd58d6f11c1d6dR562

> This check SHOULD be performed periodically (e.g., every 8 transactions) to enable early rejection without impacting parallel execution.
do you mean when we consolidate the result of the parallel execution, every 8 transactions consolidated we check and if there is an issue we stop the others background process that are still running transactions in parallel
